This specification defines APIs to manage web apps.

Summary of Methods

InterfaceMethod
WebAppManagerObject
WebAppManager void getWebAppInfo(WebAppInfoArraySuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback, optional sequence<DOMString>? webAppId)
void terminateWebApp(DOMString webAppId, optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
long watchWebAppInfo(WebAppInfoSuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback, optional sequence<DOMString>? webAppId)
void clearWatchWebAppInfo(long watchId)
WebAppInfo
WebAppInfoSuccessCallback void onsuccess(WebAppInfo webAppInfo)
WebAppInfoArraySuccessCallback void onsuccess(sequence<WebAppInfo> webAppInfo)

Introduction

This API provides functionalities to manage web apps.

Interfaces

WebAppManagerObject

There will be a motor.webappmgr object that allows accessing the functionality of the webappmgr module.
readonly attribute WebAppManager webappmgr

WebAppManager

WebAppManager interface.
void getWebAppInfo(WebAppInfoArraySuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback, optional sequence<DOMString>? webAppId)
Gets web apps information.
Signature
void getWebAppInfo(WebAppInfoArraySuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback, optional sequence<DOMString>? webAppId)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if any input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code INVALID_VALUES_ERR if the input parameter contains an invalid value.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
WebAppInfoSuccessCallback successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
optional sequence<DOMString>? webAppId
Used for filtering the web app IDs. If webAppId is null, return all web apps information.
						
						motor.webappmgr.getWebAppInfo(function(webAppInfo) {
							console.log("The web app name: " + webAppInfo[0].name);	
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to get the web app info: " + e.message);
						}, null);
void terminateWebApp(DOMString webAppId, optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Terminates the specified web app.
Signature
void terminateWebApp(DOMString webAppId, optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if any input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code INVALID_VALUES_ERR if the input parameter contains an invalid value.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
DOMString webAppId
Used for terminating the web app ID.
optional SuccessCallback? successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
						
						var id = "WEB_APP_ID";	

						motor.webappmgr.terminateWebApp(id, function() {
							console.log("Web app Terminating success.");
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to terminate the web app: " + e.message);
						});
long watchWebAppInfo(WebAppInfoSuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback?, optional sequence<DOMString>? webAppId)
Subscribes to receive notifications about the change in status of a web app.
Signature
long watchWebAppInfo(WebAppInfoSuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback? errorCallback, optional sequence<DOMString>? webAppId)
Return value
The identifier used to clear the watch subscription.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code INVALID_VALUES_ERR if the errorCallback input parameter is an undefined errorCallback.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
WebAppInfoSuccessCallback successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
optional sequence<DOMString>? webAppId
Used for filtering the web app IDs. If webAppId is null, watch all web apps information.
						function webAppInfoSuccessCB(webAppInfo)	{
							console.log("The web app ID : " + webAppInfo.id + 
								  "\nThe web app name : " + webAppInfo.name +								  
								  "\nThe web app's CPU usage : + webAppInfo.cpu");
						}

						function errorCB(err)	{
							console.log("Error : " + err.message);
						}

						motor.webappmgr.watchWebAppInfo(webAppInfoSuccessCB, errorCB, null);
void clearWatchWebAppInfo(long watchId)
Unsubscribes the watch operation by the watchWebAppInfo() method.
Signature
void clearWatchWebAppInfo(long watchId)
Return value
none
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code INVALID_VALUES_ERR if the input parameter contains an invalid value.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
				
						var watchId = motor.webappmgr.watchWebAppInfo(WebAppInfoSuccessCB, ErrorCB);
						
						function webAppInfoSuccessCB(webAppInfo)	{
							motor.webappmgr.clearWatchWebAppInfo(watchId);	
						}

						function errorCB(err)	{
							console.log("Error : " + err.message);
						}

						var watchId = motor.webappmgr.watchWebAppInfo(webAppInfoSuccessCB, errorCB, null);

WebAppInfo

Define the attributes of a web app information.
It is used in the successCallback of the watchWebAppInfo() method or getWebAppInfo() method.
readonly attribute DOMString id
The unique ID of the web app.
readonly attribute DOMString name
The web app name
readonly attribute long cpu
The most recent measurement of the web app's CPU usage, between 0 and 100%.
readonly attribute long privateMemory
The most recent measurement of the web app's private memory usage, in bytes.
readonly attribute long jsMemoryAllocated
The most recent measurement of the web app's JavaScript allocated memory, in bytes.
readonly attribute long jsMemoryUsed
The most recent measurement of the web app's JavaScript memory used, in bytes.
readonly attribute long network
The most recent measurement of the web app's network usage, in bytes per second.
readonly attribute long fps
The most recent measurement of the web app's frames per section.

WebAppInfoSuccessCallback

The success callback for WebAppManager.watchWebAppInfo().
void onsuccess(WebAppInfo webAppInfo)
The method invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
Signature
void onsuccess(WebAppInfo webAppInfo)
WebAppInfo webAppInfo
The web app information.

WebAppInfoArraySuccessCallback

The success callback for WebAppManager.getWebAppInfo().
void onsuccess(WebAppInfo webAppInfo)
The method invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
Signature
void onsuccess(sequence<WebAppInfo> webAppInfo)
sequence<WebAppInfo> webAppInfo
The web apps information.

Features

When the feature
  • http://obigo.com/api/webappmgr
or any of the features hierarchically under that feature is successfully requested, the interface WebAppManager is instantiated, and the resulting object appears in the global namespace as motor.webappmgr.
This is the list of URIs used to declare this API's features, for use in the widget config.xml. For each URL, the list of functions covered is provided.

http://obigo.com/api/webappmgr
Access to all the features in this module.
